name: Afra
title: Warm and Comforting
message: This is a favorite of mine. The smell of vanilla is just right and not overpowering. The honey gives it a warm and comforting scent. It’s a great candle to have on when your just relaxing. Would definitely buy again.

name: Syara
title: Wonderful Scent!
message: I received the Comforting Candle from the Well Living Collection to test and review. This has a wonderful scent of Vanilla and Honey! I like how the scent has a calming effect on you. This candle comes in a clear glass jar with a wood cover and has 2 wicks.

name: Fyza
title: My new favorite
message: The Comforting Yankee Candle is my new favorite candle. I am just so in love with this fragrance. I can smell the vanilla and honey as distinct, independent scents; yet they also blend into a soothing aroma. From a design standpoint, I think the tall, slender, square-ish shape is beautiful. The lid is wood; I use mine as a platform to place my candle. And as always, this Yankee Candle burns even and lasts for a long time.

name: Mohammad
title: Great soothing and relaxing scent
message: Try is candle is a good size and doesn’t burn too quickly so it lasts awhile. The smell of vanilla/honey is amazing and it filled the whole house. Not overwhelming but smelled like I was baking cookies.

name: Jahid
title: Smells great!
message: I actually didn’t choose this, I had the customer service agent recommend this to me. I was a little apprehensive but boy was I wrong. It is strong and everyone loves it

name: Lorie74
title: Lovely but cracked
message: The candle smells lovely, but it came cracked and didn’t feel like going thru the trouble of returning it. I’m not sure if I’d recommend it, but I’m glad I did. I’ll be back soon.
